name: beta-kafka-zookeeper
preInstallNotes:
This DC/OS service is currently a beta candidate undergoing testing as part of a formal beta test program.

There may be bugs, incomplete features, incorrect documentation, or other discrepancies.

Default configuration requires 3 agent nodes each with: 1.0 CPU | 4000 MB MEM | 5000 MB Disk

Contact Mesosphere before deploying this beta candidate service. Product support is available to approved participants in the beta test program. By using this service you agree to the license terms here: https://github.com/mesosphere/dcos-zookeeper/blob/master/LICENSE

Versions: Apache ZooKeeper 3.4.11
postInstallNotes:
The DC/OS Apache Zookeeper service is being installed.

	Documentation: https://docs.mesosphere.com/service-docs/kafka-zookeeper/
	Issues: https://docs.mesosphere.com/support/
postUninstallNotes:
The DC/OS Apache Zookeeper service is being uninstalled.

For DC/OS versions from 1.10 no further action is required. For older DC/OS versions follow the instructions at https://docs.mesosphere.com/service-docs/kafka-zookeeper/uninstall to remove any persistent state if required.
